EmailTemplate.subject: Membership Renewal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
At the onset, we would like to thank you for placing your trust with us and are pleased to inform you that your membership has been renewed.
You will continue to avail the following services: • Dedicated Certified Financial Planner [CFP] o Conference calls/meetings at your discretion with your Financial Planner o Single point contact [who will act as a coach] for any queries • Restructuring of the plan, if required, due to changes in personal circumstances • Access to Member portal o will help in Consolidation & tracking • Implementation o Ffreedom team will help you to execute every single action plan o Help get the best possible rates, wherever possible • Reviews o Ongoing Review o Annual review • Other Services o Monthly statements & updates on your Financial Plan o Ffreedom Team proactively interacting with you on an ongoing basis o SIP & Premium reminders o You will be part of our weekly update & monthly Commentary mailers [to keep you updated on the environment] • Additional Offerings [at an extra price] o Estate Planning o Income Tax Planning We understand the importance of the responsibility that you have entrusted upon us and we assure you that our continuous endeavor will be to empower you in achieving your financial goals.
We, at Ffreedom, believe that each one of us is entitled to a life void of financial worries and strains. Whether it is planning for your child’s education or marriage, starting up a new business or buying a new house etc, we will direct and guide you in making appropriate and wise Financial Planning decisions to help you accomplish your financial goals.
Looking forward for a long & mutually beneficial relationship and assuring you of best services.
Warm Regards, Team Ffreedom.
